text: Kananjalo phakathi kwabo kuya kubakho (umsantsa), umkhusane kuze kwiindonga eziphakamileyo kubekho abantu (Abazenzo zabo ezilungileyo zilingana nezenzo zabo ezigwenxa) abaza kubazi bonke (abahlali basePaladesi nabasesiHogweni) ngeempawu zabo. Baya kumemeza kubantu basePaladesi: “Salâmun ‘alaykum (uxolo malube nani)” ngelo xesha bona abantu abaphezu kweendonga eziphakamileyo) baya kuba bengekangeni (ePaladesi) kodwa baya kuba benethemba lokuyingena ngokuqinisekileyo
